page.title: 16LAW AND ORDER
page.content: LAW AND ORDER IN HILTON On Friday afternoon David and I made an appointment to goto Tain police station and interview Sergeant Revie, and ask him a few questions about what happens in Hilton,and what he has to do. Hilton of Cadboll is a quiet village with hardly any trouble,but there is the odd whisper of vandalism, breakins and people that go around in cars asking to take you home.To make sure these things don't happen two policemen go round the three villages. The two policemen split into shifts one on day-shift and the other is on back-shift,they go around 24 hours a-day,7 days a week.A couple of policemen also come to our school telling us not to go in cars with strangers.
